headline: How A Value Play Like Costco Stock Became A Swing Trade
summary: Since the IBD Methodology is clearly in the growth strategy camp, why is it that value plays have started appearing on our SwingTrader product?  Costco Wholesale had a nice run in 2024.  Costco currently sports an IBD Earnings Stability Rating of 1 (the rating goes from 1 to 99 with 1 being the most stable).

headline: OFF BEAUTY Announces National Expansion as Korea’s First Discount Beauty Outlet Chain with Up to 90% Discounts
summary: Emerging as a Potential Challenger to Olive YoungSeoul, South Korea, Feb. 13, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- OFF BEAUTY, an urban beauty outlet platform operated by Q&B International, today announced its nationwide expansion as Korea’s first discount beauty outlet chain, offering shoppers up to 90% off retail prices. headline: Costco bets big on e-commerce after Walmart surge

headline: President Trump's Tariffs To Face Feb.20 Supreme Court Hearing As Prediction Markets Doubt Favorable Ruling
summary: U.S. Supreme Court to rule on Trump's tariffs in February; retailers like Costco and manufacturers like Toyota are fighting for refunds worth billions.

headline: Costco defied Trump’s DEI directive as Target and Walmart scaled back. Business is booming
summary: Many companies have dialed back their DEI programs since January 2025, but not Costco.

headline: Costco Tests European E Commerce Delivery While Shares Trade At Premium
summary: Costco Wholesale (NasdaqGS:COST) is expanding same day grocery delivery to Europe through its partnership with Instacart. The company has launched its first dedicated delivery websites in France and Spain to support this rollout. This marks Costco's first move into e commerce grocery delivery in European markets. For a company built around in store membership and bulk purchasing, Costco is now adding a fresh digital layer to its model in Europe. Same day delivery via Instacart in France and...

headline: New hack makes Costco's $1.50 hot dog easier
summary: There are plenty of things to love about shopping at Costco. But if there's one thing that keeps members coming back time and time again, it's Costco's iconic $1.50 hot dog and soda combo.
